title: How to earn in business in MLM marketing - Quora

response.answer_text: As somebody associated with MLM in India for the last ten years I can tell you the only way to earn in MLM is to KEEP DOING IT FOR YEARS TIRELESSLY AND RELENTLESSLY AND NEVER GIVING IT UP!!!Do you have the patience???Do you need income so badly that you would rather do something like quick to earn a few bucks and not venture into something so long term?? If your idea is to take it up with  a mission like zeal and keep on searching for the right person to join you and do repurchase month after month and also search for more people through your downlines who will do the same and hold the team together with an extraordinary product and an extraordinary company and a great plan then there is something like success which you might see. Statistics says only 3% succeed.Others leave early.Your question is HOW DO I EARNin MLM??The answer is just find two people who can buy the product month on month.Then work with them to find two more persons each to purchase month on month and keep working ......
